config.section.Intro.name: Farm size reminder: WaFF> medium, WaFFLE> large
config.World_Map_Colors.name: World Map Colors
config.World_Map_Colors.description: Change the color of the farm area on the world map to fit the recolor you're using. May not work alongside SVE if the recolor mod itself doesn't support SVE.
config.section.Additional_Locations.name: > Additional locations
config.Use_Northern_Path.name: Use the Northern Path
config.Use_Northern_Path.description: Add a new map between the farm's northern exit and the Backwoods.
config.section.Abandoned_Shed_Ex.name: > Abandoned Shed Exterior
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.name: Shed location on WaFF
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.desc: Either set the abandoned shed location on the medium map or disable it entirely.
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFFLE.de: Either set the abandoned shed location on the large map or disable it entirely.
config.Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.name: Shed appearance
config.Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.descrip: Either let the game decide or manually select the appearance of the shed to fit different textures packs.
config.section.Abandoned_Shed_In.name: > Abandoned Shed Interior
config.Shed_Wood_Color.name: Floor planks color
config.Shed_Wood_Color.description: Either select the color of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars or leave the ground as stone.
config.Shed_Wood_Type.name: Floor planks texture
config.Shed_Wood_Type.description: Select the texture of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.
config.Remove_Shed_Pillars.name: Remove the pillars
config.Remove_Shed_Pillars.description: Increase visibility and available space inside the abandoned shed by removing the support pillars.
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type.name: Roof greenhouse layout
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type.description: Set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.
config.section.Cave_Shortcuts.name: > Cave & Shortcuts
config.Use_Waterfall_Cave.name: Farm's cave replacement
config.Use_Waterfall_Cave.description: Allow the Waterfall cave to no longer act as an extra location but replace the farm's cave instead. As long as that option is NOT used, the farm's cave will be left untouched (allowing for the use of a different mod's cave if desired). WARNING! Empty your cave before activating that option as cave's content is not transferred automatically!
config.Smaller_Shortcut_Caves.name: Smaller shortcut entrances
config.Smaller_Shortcut_Caves.descriptio: Make the shortcuts' entrances smaller. Regular horses will no longer be able to use them.
config.Secret_Woods_Shortcut.name: Shortcut to Secret Woods
config.Secret_Woods_Shortcut.description: Unlock a path next to the farm's shrine that will quickly lead to the Secret Woods if the player has already been there at least once.
config.section.Animals_Monsters.name: > Animals Features
config.Pethouse_Type_WaFF.name: WaFF pet house
config.Pethouse_Type_WaFF.description: Either remove the pet house or change its appearance to fit different textures styles.
config.Use_Animal_Pen_WaFF.name: WaFF animal pens
config.Use_Animal_Pen_WaFF.description: Place one or more animal pens on the western side of the medium sized farm.
config.Pethouse_Type_WaFFLE.name: WaFFLE pet house
config.Pethouse_Type_WaFFLE.description: Either remove the pet house or change its appearance to fit different textures styles.
config.Use_Animal_Pen_WaFFLE.name: WaFFLE animal pens
config.Use_Animal_Pen_WaFFLE.description: Place one or more animal pens on the western side of the large farm.
config.Use_Invisible_Barriers.name: Invisible animal barriers
config.Use_Invisible_Barriers.descriptio: Prevent animals from using stairs, bridges or leaving the pen. Disable to let them roam the farm freely.
config.section.Water_Features.name: > Water Features
config.Beach_Type_WaFF.name: WaFF beach type
config.Beach_Type_WaFF.description: When playing on the medium map, choose between a dry beach full of sand with very few water, a grassy beach with a large lake or a saltwater one with sea forage and palm trees.
config.Fish_Pool_WaFF.name: WaFF catchable fish
config.Fish_Pool_WaFF.description: When playing on the medium map, select the type of fishes that can be caught on the farm (this feature will change after Stardew Valley 1.6 update). Sea fishes can only be caught if the sea beach is active.
config.Beach_Type_WaFFLE.name: WaFFLE beach type
config.Beach_Type_WaFFLE.description: When playing on the large map, choose between a dry beach full of sand with very few water, a grassy beach with a large lake or a saltwater one with sea forage and palm trees.
config.Fish_Pool_WaFFLE.name: WaFFLE catchable fish
config.Fish_Pool_WaFFLE.description: When playing on the large map, select the type of fishes that can be caught on the farm (this feature will change after Stardew Valley 1.6 update). Sea fishes can only be caught if the sea beach is active.
config.Marine_Crab_Pots.name: Marine crab pots
config.Marine_Crab_Pots.description: Allow crab pots to catch sea fishes instead of freshwater ones. Will only work if the sea beach is active.
config.Turn_Pond_into_Spa.name: Healing pond
config.Turn_Pond_into_Spa.description: Turn the small pond south of the twin waterfalls into a healing pond.
config.No_Water_Spa.name: No water effects in pond
config.No_Water_Spa.description: Remove water effects and properties from the healing pond (usefull for some mod compatibility issues, note that this is automatically actived when using the Swim mod).
config.section.Terrain_Features.name: > Terrain Features
config.TF_Dirt_Color.name: Southern dirt color
config.TF_Dirt_Color.description: Select the color of the dirt around the twin falls area. The automatic option will leave the dirt dark and only change it in case of compatibility issues (like mods trying to use said dirt as quarry tiles).
config.Use_Small_Ridges.name: Add small ridges
config.Use_Small_Ridges.description: Add two small ridges south of the farmhouse and near the south-eastern bridge.
config.Less_Cliffs.name: Cliffs removal
config.Less_Cliffs.description: Remove some cliffs from the farm to create larger flat areas.
config.Fountain_Decoration.name: Decorated fountain area
config.Fountain_Decoration.description: Add fountains and their decorated surroundings to the selected farms.
config.Use_Wooden_Bridges.name: Wooden bridges on WaFFLE
config.Use_Wooden_Bridges.description: Revert the eastern stone bridges on WaFFLE to their previous wooden form.
config.section.Foliage.name: > Fences & Foliage
config.Less_Fences.name: Less fences
config.Dense_Forest_Area.name: Dense forested areas
config.Dense_Forest_Area.description: Add trees and a dense foliage above the tree stumps West of both farms and East of WaFFLE.
config.section.Bonus.name: > Bonus & Debug Menu
config.Unlock_Shed.name: Unlock the upgraded shed
config.Unlock_Shed.description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.
config.Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Cave.name: More casks in the cave & shed
config.Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Cave.descr: Once the farmhouse cellar is built, also extend the usage of casks to the Waterfall Cave and the entry floor of the abandoned shed.
config.Add_Dark_Shrine.name: Add Dark Shrine to the farm
config.Add_Dark_Shrine.description: Generate a statue next to Grandpa's shrine that'll behave as a Dark Shrine. Useful to correct older versions of the farm where monsters spawning was incorrectly activated.
